title: Puppet Modules: Apps for Ops
summary: Puppet modules provide reusable operations ("ops") code in a manner analogous to Django apps. This talk explores the Puppet ecosystem through the eyes of a typical Python developer, and demonstrates how to use Puppet modules effectively to deploy and secure Python web applications.
